Class AlgebraEditor

public class AlgebraEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint

the bugFerry
A Web-Based (Debugging) Editor for the Table Algebra
see readme for information on how to compile this application

Author:
Patrick Brosi

addCanvasView

public AlgebraEditorCanvasView addCanvasView(int id)
Add a new canvas to the editor with the given id. Note that this will not add a new plan to the bundle stored on the server! Use createNewPlan(id) for this. If a canvas with the given id already exists, it is returned

Parameters:
id - the id of the new canvas
Returns:
the new canvas or the canvas with the given id if it already exists

changeCanvas

public void changeCanvas(int id)
Switches to the canvas with the given id

Parameters:
id - the id of the canvas to switch to

clearCanvases

public void clearCanvases()
Clear all canvases. Note, however, that this will not affect the query bundle stored on the server.

createNewPlan

public void createNewPlan(boolean clearFirst)
Adds a new plan to the bundle

Parameters:
clearFirst - if true, all other plans will be removed first

getCanvas

public AlgebraEditorCanvasView getCanvas(int pid)
Returns the canvas object with the given id or null if no canvas with that id exists

Parameters:
pid - the id to look for
Returns:
the LogicalCanvas with the specified id

Returns an integer not yet used as a canvas id

Returns:
